tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LivestockMortality (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_type VARCHAR(50),
  cause_of_death TEXT,
  date_of_death TIMESTAMP,
  mortality_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  livestock_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  birth_date DATE NOT NULL,
  herd_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Livestock { 
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  Name VARCHAR(50), 
  Species VARCHAR(50), 
  Age INT, 
  DateOfBirth DATE 
}

CREATE TABLE MortalityRecords { 
  RecordID INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  LivestockID INT, 
  CauseOfDeath VARCHAR(100), 
  DateOfDeath DATE, 
  FOREIGN KEY (LivestockID) REFERENCES Livestock(ID) 
}

CREATE TABLE HerdHealth { 
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  LivestockID INT, 
  HealthStatus VARCHAR(50), 
  LastCheckupDate DATE, 
  FOREIGN KEY (LivestockID) REFERENCES Livestock(ID) 
}

CREATE TABLE livestock_mortality_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  livestock_id INT,
  mortality_date DATE,
  cause_of_death VARCHAR(255)
)
